text: We would need this for visualisation.
title: There is no vec_to_sym function

text:
> We would need this for visualisation.

Are you sure that you don't mean the converse: vec_to_sym? It seems to me
that this is what we would need for visualization.
I saw there is. May be I am missing something ?

This PR #1236 has many things that may be useful in it, including `vec_to_sym`. I am not going to finish it before I am sure of how we do the statistical testing for the `tangent` coefficients. I am working on this right now, but I can in the meantime remove the statistical testing part, and address all the comments.
Just tell me if this is useful for you so I do it @AlexandreAbraham  @GaelVaroquaux .
